name: chatbot
description: The **Gemini Chatbot** is an AI-powered conversational assistant built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrated with the Gemini large language model (LLM) via APIs. It is designed to handle real-time queries, provide personalized responses, and adapt to user preferences over time. This chatbot can be deployed directly in a browser and is intended for use in various industries such as customer service, education, and personal assistance.
